desc: A live recording of a baseball game between the Yankees and the Red Sox.

sttData.content: The Yankees are playing the Red Sox in the third game of the series.
sttData.speaker: Announcer 1

sttData.content: The first inning ends with the score at 0-0. Both teams have had opportunities to score but have failed to capitalize.
sttData.speaker: Announcer 1

sttData.content: In the bottom of the second, the Red Sox manage to put a run on the board. The Yankees respond with two runs in the top of the third, taking the lead.
sttData.speaker: Announcer 1

sttData.content: The game remains close with both teams exchanging runs. In the eighth inning, the Red Sox tie the game, sending it into extra innings.
sttData.speaker: Announcer 2

sttData.content: The tension builds as both teams struggle to break the tie. The game finally concludes with the Yankees securing a walk-off win.
sttData.speaker: Announcer 2

stt.sttSummary: This recording captures a thrilling baseball game between the Yankees and the Red Sox, with both teams demonstrating excellent play and the game remaining close throughout.
